text: Melum pitiyo, patukappaip parriya ceytiyo avarkalukku ettumanal, utane avarkal atai parappi vitukirarkal;. Avarkal atai (allahvin) tutaritamo, allatu avarkalil ninrumulla atikarikalitamo terivittal, avarkaliliruntu atai ukittu ariyakkutiyavarkal, atai nanku vicarittarintu (takka erpatukalaic ceytu) kolvarkal. Allahvutaiya kirupaiyum avanutaiya arulum unkal mitillatiruntal, unkalil cilarait tavira marravarkal saittanaiye pinparriyirupparkal
